name: Mariela Perez
summary: Highly motivated teaching professional with over 10 years of experience in a fast-paced consulting environment. Extensive experience supporting young children and parents, clients and consultants in high-profile technology projects. Excellent analytical abilities and talent for managing information.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Advanced administrative and project support for young children-level consultants for special holiday projects; activities, music, and language arts. Led a project to streamline and reorganize the SharePoint project management system; coordinated project plans, scheduling, and budgeting for a high-profile project. Prepared best-practice guidelines for archiving project documents; contributed to company-wide adoption. Trained staff, guided classroom routines, encouraged positive behaviors, and maintained a safe play environment. Communicated with parents about daily activities; ensured toy safety and sanitation; prepared nutritious meals.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Advanced administrative support to senior classroom staff in a fast-paced daycare. Coordinated research on activities, streamlined proposal development, and created a client tracking system. Encouraged positive behaviors, established a safe play environment, organized recreational activities, and maintained child-focused care including diapering, nutrition, hygiene, and parent communication.

experience.title: Teacher Aid
experience.description: Advanced administrative support; consultants for special holiday projects; activities, music, art, and language arts. Encouraged good behaviors with positive reinforcement; established a safe play environment; organized games and puzzles; diapering; sanitation; outdoor recreation; nutritious meals; ongoing parent communication.

education.degree: Associate of Applied Science in Early Childhood Education
Associate of Applied Science in Early Childhood Education (AASECE)

certifications: Certified Associate Of Applied Science In Early Childhood Education (AAS-ECE)
